(I'm taking back control of Chordate from Yanshosh)


Chordate:



Chordate sipped a cup of slightly heated energon.  It was about five degrees 
lower than the temperature needed to set the energon off into an explosion.  
He spit his energon up on his lap, though he ignored that, and looked at a 
monitor.

He saw Koj and Inu shoot open storage chamber and continued to watch them 
leave the Cybertronian Fire.  He activated his comm. unit to Kluster and Iron 
Raptor.

"Kluster, Iron Raptor, this is Chordate.  Those two new Maximals, Koj and 
Inu, have just stolen quite a bit of supplies from the Cybertronian Fire, and 
in the direction they're heading, I can only see one real important thing, 
the Ark.  I'm going to place them on enemy." he ended the transmission.

He finished putting them on enemy only a cycle later, when a thought popped 
into his head.  Ever since that Predacon inflitrated the Cybertronian Fire, 
the codes had never been changed.  The comm. frequencies and shield 
frequencies had, but nothing else.

He began working on that, knowing it would only take a couple cycles to set 
up the programs to randomly change the codes that would then send all the new 
codes to those with the authority.

(Such as, people, I can't tell who gets which codes because I don't know all 
the Maximals, but for something like emergency shut off of all systems in the 
CF, new recruits wouldn't have that.  That would be just Iron Raptor, 
Kluster, and Chordate.  Please be logical like that when Chordate finishes 
the codes and I have him send 'em out.  Thank you)
